means: 脱衣服( undress的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She undressed the child before putting her in the tin bath.
sentence.Network_cn: 她给孩子脱下衣服，然后把她放进锡铁澡盆里。

sentence.Network_en: Fifteen minutes later he was undressed and in bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 15分钟后他便穿了睡衣躺在床上了。

sentence.Network_en: He got undressed in the bathroom.

entry.tran: 未穿衣服的；裸体的；只穿睡衣的
entry.def: If you are undressed, you are wearing no clothes or your night clothes. If you get undressed, you take off your clothes.

example.ex: Fifteen minutes later he was undressed and in bed...
example.tran: 15分钟后他便穿了睡衣躺在床上了。

example.ex: He got undressed in the bathroom.

means.word_mean: 1. of lumber or stone or hides; not finished or dressed;
